title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; identical API surface to Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; stream, chat, pull models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with fzf model picker & chat REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental Vim plugin fork adding Ollama as a free local backend for Copilot-style completions.
highlights: zero config if Ollama runs on 11434

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration injecting Ollama client beans with application.properties.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, completion, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for iOS/macOS apps to chat with Ollama models via Swift Concurrency.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform binary < 10 MB.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or continue writing notes locally.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package download page with weekly stats and usage examples.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI page showing install command, version history, and project links.
